text: The men's 1500 metres event at the 2005 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Erfurt, Germany, at Steigerwaldstadion on 15 and 17 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Arturo Casado ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Stefan Eberhardt ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Francisco España ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 17 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
